data.name: Shinobi Warfare
data.detailed_description:
Shinobi Warfare is a 2d RPG Turn Based game which lets you create and customize up to six different shinobis, strengthen them with different set of skills, weapons and more accessories to level up and compete with other players.
The game offers different multiplier game modes which allows you to team up and play or compete with others, such as Clan Wars, Offline Arena, Live PVP and more.
You can play trough various events and missions to level up and unlock new items, and if you ever feel lonely, you could always recruit friends to the battles!
data.about_the_game:
Shinobi Warfare is a 2d RPG Turn Based game which lets you create and customize up to six different shinobis, strengthen them with different set of skills, weapons and more accessories to level up and compete with other players.
The game offers different multiplier game modes which allows you to team up and play or compete with others, such as Clan Wars, Offline Arena, Live PVP and more.
You can play trough various events and missions to level up and unlock new items, and if you ever feel lonely, you could always recruit friends to the battles!
data.short_description: Play an 2d turn based RPG multiplayer game, stylize your own shinobi and play different game modes alone or with your friends! Level up, unlock various items and skills and procced in your journey of becoming the next Kage!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, Windows 8.1 Classic or Windows 10
  • Processor: 33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.7, and above
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
